EmailTemplate.description: To notify the approver that a community member registration is pending their approval
EmailTemplate.name: Community Member Approval Request Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Approval Required: New Community Member
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
[Image alt text: RiseTogetherLogo] < https://ajsd-b-dev-ed.develop.my.site.com/RiseTogetherPortal > Hello ,
A new Community Member Registration is pending your approval. Please review the application at your earliest convenience.
Here are the details of Registration:
Submitted by : {{{Community_Member__c.OwnerFullName}}}
Created on : {{{Community_Member__c.CreatedDate}}}
Best Regards
Rise Together
RiseTogether < https://ajsd-b-dev-ed.develop.my.site.com/Risetogethermain >
